onset.Description: Onset of the event measured from the beginning of the acquisition of the first volume in the corresponding task imaging data file at wake

duration.Description: Duration of the event measured from onset

trial_Type.Description: Indicator of type of blocks that was presented

Levels.prepa_face: preparation phase of the face game
Levels.rest_face_1: resting after the face game, part 1
Levels.rest_face_2: resting after the face game, part 2
Levels.rest_face_3: resting after the face game, part 3
Levels.prepa_maze: preparation phase of the maze game
Levels.rest_maze_1: resting after the maze game, part 1
Levels.rest_maze_2: resting after the maze game, part 2
Levels.rest_maze_3: resting after the maze game, part 3
Levels.rest_win_face: resting after the face game that is won
Levels.rest_win_maze: resting after the maze game that is won
